name: Astrobun
description:
The year is 21XX. A strange distress signal has been sent from space. Astro, a space captain from the planet Bunnaria, must investigate, alongside her crew members, Liz and O'Hare.

Astrobun is a platformer game inspired by the Metroidvania genre, in which you take the role of a bunny named Astro, and have to jump, shoot and roll your way through a strange planet!

As you progress through the game, you are granted new abilities to utilise, pathways to explore, and treasure to collect. Astrobun has a lot of focus on making the movement feel fast, fluid and fun, in a way that makes it easy to pick up and play, but difficult to master.
